description: An artistic rendition of Atlantis as a thriving ancient metropolis bathed in sunlight.
Ancient Egyptian pyramids radiating beams of light into the starry night sky.
Ancient map scrolls and nautical charts with an overlay of golden lines connecting the pyramids to a mythical point in the ocean.
A glimmering golden trinket sinking, surrounded by dark water and bubbles, symbolizing the lost secrets.
Underwater ruins with columns and arches covered in seaweed, suggestive of a once grand civilization.
The silhouette of a diver equipped with a headlamp looking into the dark abyss of the ocean.
